original_text: I have fed you with milk, and not with meat: for hitherto ye were not able to bear it, neither yet now are ye able.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 젖으로 먹이고 밥으로 아니하였노니 이는 너희가 감당하지 못하였음이거니와 지금도 못하리라

sentences.original_text: I have fed you with milk
for hitherto ye were not able to bear it
neither yet now are ye able
